Okay, so I noticed something. I don't know if it's a bug or not, but apparently the web editor doesn't allow HTML in messages? (or maybe it just doesn't like forms?)

Proof of this is at the bottom of this post. If you download the game, it works just fine in the desktop version of Quest.

Aside from this, that same 'game' just happens to be a login test (which doesn't actually connect to any servers -- [url=http://forum.textadventures.co.uk/viewtopic.php?f=10&t=3608:13qs1wkh]click here[/url:13qs1wkh] for more info on why not, if you can understand anything in that thread)

Basically, I just threw it together to show that Quest (at least, the desktop version) can contain HTML code virtually anywhere, including in the Status panel.

[list:13qs1wkh]LINK: [url:13qs1wkh]http://www.textadventures.co.uk/review/1197/[/url:13qs1wkh][/list:u:13qs1wkh]

EDIT: Ignore the first half. I switched browsers and it worked perfectly. Curse you, Chrome Canary!!
